When you want to add an activity, press the + sign at the bottom of your screen as shown in the diagram above
After you click on the + button, you\'ll be brought to a screen as shown in the diagrams above, don\'t worry if you can\'t see the rest of the UI, just keep on scrolling!
Your tasks will be displayed here after adding with auto sorting based on date and time, if you wish to edit or delete your task just long hold on them.
A dialog will appear like this where you can choose to edit or delete. Delete will remove the selected task and edit will bring you to another screen.
Your selected task\'s data will be brought over here where you can change the values then just press update again.
On the last diagram above, you can see a few options in the menu with About having some info about the app, Clear All will clear every task currently made and How To Use leads to this page
